description: Remotely browse and edit any GitHub repository
config.logLevel: Specifies how much (if any) to log to the _GitHub Repositories_ output channel
config.logLevel.info: Logs all errors, warnings, and messages
config.logLevel.debug: Logs all errors, warnings, and messages with extra context useful for debugging
config.autoFetch.enabled: Specifies whether to periodically fetch from the upstream repository
config.autoFetch.interval: Specifies the interval, in seconds, to periodically fetch from the upstream repository
config.experimental.prefetch: Specifies whether to attempt prefetching tree loading (for performance testing)
config.search.download.sizeLimit: Specifies the size (in MB) of repository index cache. The search cache is located in the extension's global storage folder
config.search.download.repoLimit: Specifies the maximum number of repository indexes cached per repo. Each reference requires a separate search index
config.indexing.verboseDownloadNotificat: Whether to show pop up notifications with index download progress. When disabled, download progress will be will displayed in the status bar.
config.indexing.maxIndexSize: Maximum size in (MB) of repository index contents to download without explicit request. Set to `null`/empty to never auto download repository index contents, or 0 to always prompt before downloading repository index contents.
config.experimental.fs.useTars: Specifies whether to attempt to use tar files for file system operations
config.lfs.read.enabled: Controls whether to resolve files tracked via Git LFS from GitHub's LFS server
config.lfs.write.enabled: Controls whether to commit files tracked via Git LFS to GitHub's LFS server
